# Jake (Porsche's Picks) — Onboarding Call — October 30, 2025

**Type:** Community Partnership/Acquisition
**Participants:** Dax, Jake
**Jake's Community:** Porsche's Picks — group inside Real Sports, ~3,500–4,000 members

---

## Overview

Initial onboarding call with Jake, owner of Porsche's Picks (a community inside Real Sports). Jake is being brought on as a community partner — his members will migrate into DD Discord and he joins as staff. The call covered conversion process, promobot access, invite link setup, attribution tracking, bet tracking, and launch coordination for Saturday November 2–3.

## Key Context

- Jake's community is inside Real Sports — younger demographic, mostly 16–21, many under legal sports betting age
- Jake has his own picks channel inside DD Discord: **Porsche's Picks**
- Promobot and EV launching November 3rd pending new developer onboarding
- Staff guidelines updated to include under-18 legal protections
- Jake given manual promobot access ahead of full November 3rd launch

## Outcomes

- Jake onboarded as community partner and staff
- Three invite links created for member source tracking
- Attribution tracking process established (screenshot + partner name in mod channel)
- Bet tracking spreadsheet to be provided with AI-assisted setup offer
- Mission/vision documents to be sent before launch
- Job description to be sent — payment terms in separate contract
- Plan: call before or right after Saturday announcement to coordinate
